text: Adamo Bozzani (8 September 1891 - 31 January 1969) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's team event at the 1908 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1908 Summer Olympics Category:People from Ferrara
title: Adamo Bozzani
